articles.author: Alasdair Fotheringham
articles.title: 'Everyone always doubts me' - Geraint Thomas on pushing Evenepoel to the line - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Thomas rues tight margin to race victory in Giro d’Italia time trial, but pleased with performance
articles.content: So near, yet so far. Geraint Thomas (Ineos) was in a decidedly mixed mood after stage 9's time trial at the Giro d’Italia, where he came within a whisker of beating favourite Remco Evenepoel (Soudal-… [+3615 chars]

articles.title: Winning By Almost 2 Minutes! | Giro d'Italia Stage 8 Highlights | Eurosport - Eurosport
articles.description: It took 80km for the breakaway to form in this stage of the Giro d'Italia, but with 50km to go, Ben Healy would launch an impressive solo attack which lead h...
